resources.string: Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.
Device is already registered on server.
From GCM: Server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on server.
Could not register device on server after %1$d attempts.
Could not unregister device on server (%1$s).

The following Terms & Conditions is an electronic document in terms of the Information Technology Act, 2000 and rules made there under and the amended provisions pertaining to the electronic documents/records in various statutes as amended by the Information Technology Act, 2000.

By accessing txtBravo Platform, you are agreeing to the following terms & conditions and unconditionally agreeing to any potential guidelines and/or amendments. You may cease to use txtBravo Platform, if you do not accept the Terms & Conditions. You may not access txtBravo Platform and immediately terminate your use of txtBravo Platform. Your use of txtBravo Platform is at your own risk, including the risk that you might be exposed to content that is inappropriate, or otherwise objectionable.

User - You or Your or User refers to you, as a user of the txtBravo Platform. A user is someone who uses the txtBravo Platform including the business, for the purpose of communicating, sharing, displaying, publishing, transacting, or uploading information including but not limited to pictures, videos, messages and reviews.

Content - Information that User upload, transmit, share or display through txtBravo Platform, (collectively referred as "Contents") including but not limited to any photos, profiles (including Your name and image), messages, information, text, video, music, and third party links.

The Terms & Conditions (hereinafter referred as the "Agreement") is a legal binding contract between You, and Educing Technologies Pvt. Ltd ("Educing"), having its registered office at House no 59 A, 2nd floor,B R Mazumdar path, Baghorbari,Panjabari , Guwahati-781037. You agree that txtBravo shall not be liable to You or to any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the Application or the Site.
